name: Jetin' Extreme: Mary's Farm, Sidney Spit and Driving Range
description: A thrilling adventure camp that jets around Victoria in a camp bus, with each week offering a new plan and adventure. Activities include skimboarding, go-karting, rock climbing, and paintball. This session includes visits to Mary's Farm, Sidney Spit, and a driving range.

name: Jetin' Extreme: River Tubing, Disc Golf and VR
description: A thrilling adventure camp that jets around Victoria in a camp bus, with each week offering a new plan and adventure. Activities include skimboarding, go-karting, rock climbing, and paintball. This session includes river tubing, disc golf, and VR experiences.

name: Jetin' Extreme: Nerf Battle, Dragon Boating and Malahat Skywalk
description: A thrilling adventure camp that jets around Victoria in a camp bus, with each week offering a new plan and adventure. Activities include skimboarding, go-karting, rock climbing, and paintball. This session includes a Nerf battle, dragon boating, and a visit to Malahat Skywalk.

name: Jetin' Extreme: Arcade, Beach BBQ and Kayaking
description: A thrilling adventure camp that jets around Victoria in a camp bus, with each week offering a new plan and adventure. Activities include skimboarding, go-karting, rock climbing, and paintball. This session includes arcade games, a beach BBQ, and kayaking.

name: Jetin' Extreme: Bowling, Rock Climbing and Paddle Boarding
description: A thrilling adventure camp that jets around Victoria in a camp bus, with each week offering a new plan and adventure. Activities include skimboarding, go-karting, rock climbing, and paintball. This session includes bowling, rock climbing, and paddle boarding.

name: Jetin' Extreme: Laser Tag, Hiking and Board Game Cafe
description: A thrilling adventure camp that jets around Victoria in a camp bus, with each week offering a new plan and adventure. Activities include skimboarding, go-karting, rock climbing, and paintball. This session includes laser tag, hiking, and a board game cafe.

name: Jetin' Extreme: Wildplay, Axe Throwing and Mini-Golf
description: A thrilling adventure camp that jets around Victoria in a camp bus, with each week offering a new plan and adventure. Activities include skimboarding, go-karting, rock climbing, and paintball. This session includes Wildplay, axe throwing, and mini-golf.

name: Sensational Seas Half Day Camp
description: Join the Seaquaria Ocean Education team for their Sensational Seas Camp! Spend your days learning about colourful algae, mysterious marine invertebrates, and ocean ecosystems. Campers will get opportunities to meet starfish, sea slugs, crabs, and more!
